pages.text: The $(item)Maganatic Accumulator$() is a machine powered by OE.$(br)It will convert any OE in its internal buffer into Magan, if needed (100 OE = 1 Magan). $(br)Basically, it will incease the Magan regeneration rate by 0.1 Magan per tick.$(br2)It can be charged by being bound to any OE-Block and standing nearby (while having it equipped).
